description: Ms. codex. Title from inscription on fol. 1a (later hand). Physical description: Text 1 written in medium small casual naskh with elements of nastaʻlīq in black ink, with 17 lines per page (114 x 70 mm.). Text 2 written in small nastaʻlīq in black ink with use of red, with 21 lines per page (123 x 80 mm.). Important marginal annotations on both texts. Light cream paper, glossy, with laid and chain lines visible. Fol. 1 and 95 are later added fly-leaves on European paper, blank except inscription on fol. 1a. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "Uṣūl 22". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of upper cover: "598/2 Ḥ". Origin: According to the colophons, Text 1 completed on 26 Ramaḍān 893 [Sept. 3, 1488] (colophon, fol. 65a) and copy of Text 2 dated 991 H. [1583 or 4] (colophon, fol. 94a). See however the similarity of the paper.
author: Jurjānī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, al-Sayyid al-Sharīf, 1340-1413
abstract: Collection of two glosses on fiqh and logic: a gloss by al-Jurjānī on the commentary by ʻAḍud al-Dīn al-Ījī (d. 756/1355) on the Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá by Ibn al-Ḥājib (d. 646/1249), on uṣūl al-fiqh, and part 3 (al-taṣdīqāt) of a supergloss on the gloss by the same Jurjānī on the commentary by Quṭb al-Dīn al-Rāzī al-Taḥtānī (d. 766/1364) on the Shamsīyah fī al-qawāʻid al-manṭiqīyah by Najm al-Dīn al-Kātibī (d. 675?/1276?), including glosses on Taḥtānī's commentary.
contents: 2. fol. 67a-94a: Ḥāshiyah-i ʻAjam ʻalá Taṣdīqāt al-Quṭb / [ʻAlī al-ʻAjamī]. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, no. 3199.
extent: 95 leaves : paper ; 182 x 132 mm. bound to 183 x 132 mm.
title: Sayyid-i Sharīf ʻalá Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar al-muntahá. ʻAjam ʻalá taṣdīqāt al-Quṭb.
provenance: From the books of Aḥmad Najīb Ibn Aḥmad Ṭāhir (ownership statement dated 17 R[ajab or Rabīʻ al-Thānī] [12]79 on fol. 1a). One other ownership statement on the same fol. (erased). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: جرجاني، علي بن محمد، السيد الشريف
subject: Ījī, ʻAḍud al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad, d. 1355?—Sharḥ ʻalá Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá li-Ibn al-Ḥājib
binding note: Marbled paper over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers. Brown leather spine. Modern paper pastedown and free endpaper.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
